Name: Voyager Vodka Martini
Ingredients: 5 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of frozen green grape on stick (place on stick then freeze).
Review: Why dampen your Martini with just vermouth when the Japanese and the Peruvians have so much more to offer?
History: Created in 2013 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. See Martini cocktail and its evolution
Nutrition: One serving of Voyager Vodka Martini contains 174 calories
